Indian devotees splurge on jets, gold idols as Hindu temple opensThe private jet parking lots at airports near the Indian city of Ayodhya are full and the shops have run out of gold-plated idols, as wealthy devotees prepare for the invite-only opening ceremony of one of Hinduism's holiest temples. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 07:13:01 GMT NXZLNWT5PBO65LKTXT4V3D22AU https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-devotees-splurge-jets-gold-idols-hindu-temples-open-2024-01-19/Saurabh Sharma, Tanvi Mehta世界印度
Pakistan's civil, military leaders to review Iran standoff -ministerPakistan's top civilian and military leaders will carry out a security review on Friday regarding the standoff with neighbouring Iran, the information minister said, following their strikes on each other with drones and missiles. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 06:19:08 GMT JWAUAX654JIXZGUJOUEK3DEF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/pakistan-civil-military-leaders-review-iran-standoff-minister-2024-01-19/Asif Shahzad世界
Indonesia finance minister 'continues to carry out duties' - ministryIndonesia's finance minister "continues to carry out her duties in managing state finances," her ministry said in a statement on Friday, amid reports she may resign from cabinet ahead of the Feb. 14 presidential election. U.S. eyeing Japanese shipyards for warship overhauls, says U.S. ambassadorThe United States and Japan will look at the viability of using Japanese shipyards to overhaul U.S. navy warships that patrol East Asian waters, the U.S. Ambassador to Japan Rahm Emanuel said on Friday at the Yokosuka naval base near Tokyo. Brazil's Bolsonaro's vaccination records are false, authorities sayThe vaccination records of Brazil's former president Jair Bolsonaro are false, the country's comptroller general's office said on Thursday after an investigation regarding the alleged tampering of information on his COVID-19 vaccination card.
